name: Marvel Comics (Dark & Crude, Named Characters)

blackCards.text: Spider-Man's webbing got him stuck in ____.
Iron Man solved the problem using ____.
Captain America said 'I can do this all day' about ____.
Thor's new favourite thing to smash is ____.
Hulk is angry about ____ and honestly it's fair.
Black Widow's least favourite mission involved ____.
Hawkeye would like credit for ____.
Doctor Strange opened a portal to ____.
Wolverine's healing factor can't fix ____.
Deadpool broke the fourth wall to complain about ____.
Loki's idea of teamwork is ____.
Thanos snapped and created ____.
Nick Fury's secret plan is just ____ with attitude.
The X-Mansion's biggest monthly expense is ____.
Magneto refuses to tolerate ____ ever again.
Storm's weather forecast: 100% chance of ____.
Daredevil heard ____ from three blocks away.
Punisher's 'non-negotiable' is ____.
Guardians of the Galaxy got distracted by ____.
Rocket Raccoon built ____ out of spare parts and spite.
Groot's full sentence translates to ____.
Black Panther's diplomatic solution: ____.
Venom considers ____ a love language.
Doctor Doom's latest invention is ____.
The Avengers' post-battle paperwork includes ____.

whiteCards: a webbed-up kebab and public humiliation
Tony Stark's 'hold my drink' engineering
a shield used as a dinner plate
Thor yelling at a vending machine
Hulk gently holding a tiny kitten (then screaming)
a spy mission ruined by a ringtone
Hawkeye's arrow labelled 'probably fine'
a portal opening into someone's bathroom
Wolverine's claws meeting reinforced glass
Deadpool live-tweeting the apocalypse
Loki's smugness in physical form
Thanos getting dunked on by paperwork
Nick Fury's one good eye rolling into the void
the X-Mansion insurance bill
Magneto bending a spoon out of pure pettiness
Storm summoning thunder for dramatic emphasis
Daredevil hearing your lies in HD
Punisher's intense stare and a full ammo budget
Star-Lord's playlist at the worst possible time
Rocket stealing something important 'for science'
Groot saying 'I am Groot' like it's a threat
a vibranium gadget that beeps ominously
Venom whispering 'we' like a creepy motivational coach
Doctor Doom's ego-powered reactor
an alien invasion with terrible customer service
a team meeting that becomes group therapy
a super-suit with a 'panic' button
a lab accident and a waiver form
a city-wide alert everyone ignores
property damage with heroic vibes
a villain speech interrupted by snacks
a cosmic being demanding rent
a dramatic slow-motion high five
an ancient prophecy with spelling mistakes
a gadget that definitely shouldn't exist
a multiverse glitch and a migraine
a heroic one-liner that lands like a brick
a training montage that breaks furniture
a hidden base with bad Wi-Fi
the phrase 'we're fine' immediately before disaster
